title: Kärcher Easy!Force Pressure Washer Trigger Gun
description: Kärcher Easy!Force Pressure Washer Trigger Gun
transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

Experience the new dimension of ergonomics and pressure washer cleaning with the Karcher Easy Force triggered gun. The EasyForce gun offers ergonomics at its best. When you trigger a squeeze, the force of the spray jet automatically presses the trigger into the ball of your hand resulting is effortless use. Hand and figure strain as well as muscle cramps are prevented and the operator can work for extended periods of time. Our patented easy lock  system combines the advantages of quick coupling with reliability of a screw connection. A simple 360 degree turn is all it takes to connect the components. Unbelievably five times faster compared to conventional screw connections. Designed to hold up to the demands of daily commercial cleaning, full ceramic ball and ceiling seats offers five times longer life and durability while preventing leaks. To provide greater flexibility, and range of cleaning, the lance rotates degrees during use.  An intuitive safety lock reduces the risk of unintended operation without compromising results. The nozzles go on easily and are protected by the nozzle guard to prevent damage if dropped.  Give the Karcher Easy Force a try and you'll want one.
